text: hi everyone, is anyone able to tell me if anything changed lately on contact properties API ? I no longer receive any info about hs_first_engagement_date
it used to be a DateTime now it's a timestamp and it's making our integration fail badly

Hello All,

For the Contacts object, I have some below requirements (That I looking to implement through UI as well as API)
1. Create contact with basic details - *Doable*
2. For that contact, add some children with their basic details (Name, Relationship, DoB, etc.. around 10 fields) - *Not sure how to do. Need Help*
3. Display that child information on the Right-Side bar similar to Company/Deal (Like, if we expand then it will show all child details) - *Not sure how to do. Need Help*
- These Contact & its child details, I think I must have to store in HS. So that those properties/values can be used during creating workflows.

Please let me know if you require any more details.

Thank you.
